item.title: Plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Ok m8, i guess i can help u since every1 else is stuck up… lol

Step 1- dling no-ip

on well first you need to go to http://no-ip.com

then register it will say something like register, create an account… etc…

after you register go to your email and click on the no-ip subject… then read it or not… and if there is a link then click on it and it will take u back to no-ip then while you are there u can log in… you use the email address u signed up with, and the password you signed up with.

Step 2- downloading no-ip DUC

While your on http://no-ip.com u go to the download section and you will see something like no-ip DUC 2.1 or something click on that and download it, then after its download go to “START”, “ALL PROGRAMS”, then you will see no-ip DUC at the end of all the programs, click on it and then click install. while its installing you can get ready to port foward.

Step 3- Portfowarding

First find your router and read the name off of it then go to http://www.portforward.com and find your routers name in the list of routers then click on that name it will then give you a tutorial on how to port forward it and all…
after you log in to your router. you need to change the thing that says port on them to 43594 for both of them.

Step 4- Downloading Jdk 6u7

Go to http://sun.com and then click on downloads then go to “TOP DOWNLOADS” and find JDK 6u7 which is 6 updated 7 and download that, when its finished it will be on your desktop double click and then click install after installing you can go to “start” “control panel” “system” “advanced Tab” “Environmental Variables” and you need to click “NEW” then for the name you put classpath and for the value u put CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

and then click Ok

now for system variables you click New and then type in this

path[/code] for the name and for the value you put [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin

then click ok.

then finally click the last Ok and close out of all that stuff.

Step 5- Downloading a source.

Go to the download section of mopar and find a source you want… then dl it… if you dont have winRAR you can google winRAR with the capital RAR and then find the link to get it for free…

^^ sorry about step 5 i got tired of typing lol… well thats all the stuff you really have to do… if u got any problem or questions just ask me.

Read full topic
